trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按下的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class with the specified link.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的連結初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按下的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class with the specified link and the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的連結和指定的滑鼠按鈕，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse button that causes the link to be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得按下此連結的滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> named `LinkLabel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>名為`LinkLabel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得所按下的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: A link on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 上的連結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。
